What shutdown is required? Should you add 
`system.registerOnTermination(client.shutdown())` or the like to the snippets?
Thank you for your reviewing, I don't think this is a strict requirement. Especially, `client.close()` is based on exceptions and it can be used out of the actor system in the application.
